episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and the others headed
into town, which was bustling with activity for the
new year.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1101_020:
They came across a Trainer whose Pelipper looked
a bit ill.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_040:
Pelipper isn’t feeling so good, so we’re taking a
breather here.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_050:
I’ve an idea! Why don’t we give Pelipper one of
Ribombee’s pollen puffs? They’re really nutritious!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_060:
And they’re so yummy, I bet Pelipper won’t want
to stop eating them!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_080: Thanks a lot! Pelipper’s looking a little better now!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_090:
Now all we have to do is rest up at the Pokémon
Center! But there’s just one problem...
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_100: Pelipper’s mailbag... Were you making deliveries?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_110:
Yeah, we were in the middle of delivering
greeting cards—a whole bunch of ’em, too.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_120:
Pelipper really wants to make sure everyone gets
their cards.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_130: Oh no, you can’t! You’ll overwork yourself!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_140:
I wanted to ask the other courier Pokémon for
help, but it looks like they’re all busy.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_160: Why don’t we help them deliver those cards?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_170:
Sure, I’d be happy to. I can’t turn down a request
from a Pokémon in need of help.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_180:
My Dragonite can fly. He can help us deliver
these cards.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_190:
Why don’t we say hi to some people while we’re
out making these deliveries?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_0401_210: Thanks for the help, you two!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_0402_230: Great! I’ll do what I can to help, too!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_240:
Sorry for the trouble, but thanks for the help! We
appreciate it!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_250: No problem! Leave it to us!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_260:
Lance, [Name:PlayerNickname ], let’s get to
work, shall we?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_270:
Ribombee, please fly around and help us find the
Trainers we need to deliver these to!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_280: OK, our first delivery is to...
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_290:
Silver! It looks like he got some cards from Ethan
and Lyra.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4002_1001_300:
I think I know where he might be. Let’s head over
to the forest.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and the team went to
the forest, where they found Silver training 
with Blue.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_020: I knew you’d be here. I see Blue is with you, too.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_040:
We’re here to deliver some cards from Ethan and
Lyra, and we also came to say happy New Year.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_060:
Hey, that’s awesome, Silver. Better take real good
care of those cards, eh?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_080: We have a bunch of cards for you, too, Blue!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_100: Wait, you guys are helping deliver these?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_110:
Wh-whoa! Take a look at all these cards for
Blue, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_120:
Most of them are from Gym Leaders and members
of the Elite Four!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_130:
Heh, what can I say? When you’re as big as me,
you rub elbows with a lot of important people!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_140:
By the way, do you know if Red and Leaf got the
cards I sent to them yet?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_160: Hahaha! The three of us all go way back!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_170:
But you better prepare yourself if you have cards
in that bag for them!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_180:
Those two are always running all over the place,
and they’re notoriously hard to pin down!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_200:
Well then, I suppose it’s time for us to go. Sorry
for interrupting your practice session.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_220: Can you give these to Ethan and Lyra?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_240:
They’re Ho-Oh feathers. It’s a really popular
design on clothing and greeting cards in Johto.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_250:
I got these from Ho-Oh. Unfortunately, I don’t
have any cards to send.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_260:
But one look at those feathers, and they’ll know
exactly who sent them.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_270: Pretty fancy way to send a greeting!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_280: Looks like there are three feathers...
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_290:
Yeah, one’s for you. The message is the same for
all of them.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_300: “I’m definitely not going to lose to you.”
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_320:
That’s a great rivalry you’ve got there! Reminds
me of my Kanto days!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_330:
Well, time for us to head out again! See you later,
Blue, Silver!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4003_1001_340: You, too! Be careful out there! Happy New Year!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4004_1001_010:
Phew! Looks like we’re almost done delivering all
these cards!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4004_1001_020: Let’s see, this next one is... Oh! It’s for you, Lance!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4004_1001_040: Here you go! Looks like it’s from Clair!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4004_1001_050:
Thanks, Lillie. It’s been a long time since I’ve
gotten a card from Clair.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4004_1001_060:
What’s this?
“I’ll be waiting for you at the beach.”
episode_event_newyear_2021/4004_1001_070:
Hahaha! It sounds like she’s challenging me to
a battle!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4004_1001_080:
Well, we also have some cards for her. Why don’t
we head over to the beach?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4004_1001_090:
I see... In that case, I guess I’ll accept
her challenge!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_010: There you are, Lance! Come on, let’s battle!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_020:
Of course! I, Lance the Dragon Master, accept
your challenge!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_030:
And since I’m wearing this impressive Gyarados
outfit, Gyarados and I will take you on!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_050: Well, Dragonite is out delivering cards right now.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_060:
Besides, the best Trainers know how to adapt to
unpredictable situations, right?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_070: I-I know that! Let’s go, Kingdra!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_080:
Urgh... We practiced so hard to battle Dragonite
at this spot. We even had a strategy to use the
environment to our advantage.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_090:
I see. You had a game plan and everything.
That’s why you sent me this card, huh?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_100:
I remember when we were kids, you once sent
me a cute card that had dragon Pokémon on it.
Ah, that sure takes me back...
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_110:
Why do you even remember that? It was such a
long time ago!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_120:
So what was your plan if I didn’t show up? Were
you going to wait here all day?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_130:
Of course not! I was planning on training 
here anyway!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_140:
Clair, why did you want to battle Lance right
at the start of the new year?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_150:
Hmmm. You could say it was one of my
New Year’s resolutions.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_160:
It’s a chance for me to look back on how much
I’ve grown and set goals for the new year!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_170:
I see! So that’s why you wanted to battle right
when the new year started!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_180:
Oh, before I forget—there are a bunch of cards
here for you, Clair!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_210:
Wait, you’re delivering these? Are you sure it’s OK
to take such a long break?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_220: We’ll be fine! We’re actually ahead of schedule.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_230:
But we should probably get going now. See you
later, Clair!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4005_1001_240:
Yeah, see you later! I’m gonna beat you for sure
this year, Lance!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_1101_010:
After successfully delivering all the cards,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and the others went
back to town to tell Pelipper the good news.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_1001_020:
Thank you so much! Pelipper’s feeling a lot 
better now!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_1001_030:
No problem! I’m so glad you’re feeling better,
Pelipper! Don’t push yourself so hard, OK?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_1001_040:
As a little thank-you, please accept these cards
from me!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_1001_050:
Wow! Look at all these designs! Are you sure it’s
OK for us to have these?
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_1001_060:
Yep! Feel free to send them to all the special
people in your life!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_1001_070:
This time, Pelipper and I will be the ones making
sure they get delivered!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_0401_090: Thank you! I’m glad we were able to help!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_0402_110:
Aren’t they? There are even designs with Clefairy
and Ribombee!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_1001_120:
Feel free to call on us again if you ever need help
making deliveries!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_1001_130:
Ribombee and I had a lot of fun delivering all
those cards!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_1101_140:
Soon after that, [Name:PlayerNickname ] and
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] friends wrote a lot of messages on
those cards.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_1001_150:
We asked the courier Pokémon to deliver most of
the cards...
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_1001_160:
but as for the rest, I think we can deliver these
in person!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4006_1001_170: Very well! Let’s head on out!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4007_1001_010:
To all my dearest friends and family from Alola,
happy New Year!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4007_1001_020:
Ever since I arrived on Pasio, my days have been
full of exciting experiences and encounters. I’m
enjoying my time here every day.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4007_1001_030:
I think that I’m able to have so much fun thanks
to everything you all taught me back in Alola.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4007_1001_040:
I’ll keep on doing my best to become a great
sync pair with my Pokémon.
episode_event_newyear_2021/4007_1001_050:
The next time I see you, I hope we can surprise
you with how much we’ve grown!
episode_event_newyear_2021/4007_1001_060:
Thank you for all of your support last year.
I hope this year will be even better!
